summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2952, for the improvement of 7th Avenue Northwest, from West 55th Street to West 56th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing thereon concrete sidewalks with necessary wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 35614 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
